Up for sale is this 1910 pc805 of Mr. Ty Cobb and Honus Wagner.  The rare Novelty Cutlery Series that every card has single digit populations including this one.  Registered Mail that will require a signature.  Let me know if you have any questions and thanks for looking.

No Longer available


$8200 or BO.

Steven,

Very interested. Can you email me? Thanks and take care.

[url]Connorumphress@yahoo.com[/url]

Best, Connor
